Some observations attached in pictures

Without the power saving option, got the phone to last more than a day with almost 5 hours of screen on time
With the power saving option on, got the phone to last a little less than 2 days with 5 hours on screen on time

With 128 GB of internal storage, most casual users will not run out of space quickly, however, unless you are recording tons of videos all the time
The lack of a removable card slot is mitigated somewhat by the inclusion of a USB OTG adapter that will allow you to attach a thumb drive or other USB accessory to the phone
